Utterance: Accha, Hi Sandra. Amader sathe half an hour ache sign korar jonno, ar tumi ekhon kemon feel korcho? Tomar awareness ki? Situation ta last time theke alada hoyeche.

Jeff, ami khub frustrated feel korchi je situation e tumi amake ar bacchader felecho. Mone hoye tumi bujhte parcho koto hard hoye sometimes, ar ami bacchader ke ki explain korte hoye situation niye. Amake bother kore je tumi extra time spend korte chao na bacchader sathe, ar ami honestly believe kori je future e tara resent korbe, ar tumi ke baba hishebe dekhbe na. Ami honestly bujhte parchi na je tumi keno bacchader sathe beshi time spend korte chao na. Ar jeta amader modhye hoyeche, ar tumi move on korecho, ami mone kori na je bacchader suffer korte hobe. Amra chai je tara normal life pabe, ar dui parent er sathe thakte parbe. Eta keno eto important na, tara chay na je tumi tader sathe thakbe. Eta khub hard.

Okay. Okay, tahole question ache je tumi bujhte parcho keno eta hoyeche, etc. Right? Tahole next step hobe, tumi oi chair e boshe Jeff hobe, ar dekho Jeff ki bolte pare tumake. Eta difficult hote pare. Kintu dialogue koro je he's not here anyway.

Tumi proactive hote chao bacchader dekhte. Ar ami mind kori na je tumi bacchader dekhte beshi time chaile, je agreement korechi tar theke. Jokhon tumi spontaneous kichu korte chao, tahole amader contact koro, ar dekho je okay kina.
